revised_title: London Parish-Clerks' Report on Births and Deaths in 1686 and 1687
tldr: The Company of Parish-Clerks of London reported the number of christenings and burials in the years 1686 and 1687. A total of 14,694 children were christened and 22,609 individuals were buried. This data provides insight into the population and mortality rates in London during that time.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Demography
